SELECT seq FROM sm_event_seq
UPDATE sm_event_seq SET seq=seq+1
mapper.select: SELECT seq , mall_seq AS mallSeq , type_code AS typeCode , status_code AS statusCode , title , html , thumb_img AS thumbImg , end_date AS endDate , reg_date AS regDate , lv1_seq AS lv1Seq , coupon_seq AS couponSeq , show_flag AS showFlag , main_section AS mainSection FROM sm_event WHERE 1=1 AND seq = #{seq}
SELECT eg.group_name AS groupName , eg.seq AS eventGroupSeq , eg.event_seq AS eventSeq , eg.order_no AS orderNo FROM sm_event_group eg WHERE eg.event_seq = #{seq} ORDER BY eg.order_no ASC

SELECT MAX(order_no) FROM sm_event_item WHERE 1=1
AND group_seq = #{eventGroupSeq}

SELECT MAX(order_no) FROM sm_event_group WHERE 1=1
AND event_seq = #{seq}
SELECT seq AS lv1Seq , cate_name AS cateName FROM sm_item_category WHERE depth = 1 ORDER BY seq ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM sm_event_comment WHERE 1=1 AND event_seq = #{integrationSeq}

SELECT a.seq , a.content , a.reg_date AS regDate , b.seq AS userSeq , b.id , b.name , b.nickname AS nickName FROM sm_event_comment a LEFT OUTER JOIN sm_user b ON(a.user_seq=b.seq) WHERE 1=1 AND a.event_seq = #{integrationSeq} ORDER BY a.seq DESC LIMIT ${pageNum * rowCount}, ${rowCount}
